Module ex6

Package ex6

package ex6
  • Class
    Description
    AddServlet
    A servlet implementation that handles requests to perform an addition operation.
    Agent
    Represents a generic agent in a system that can interact with messages and topics.
    BinOpAgent
    BinOpAgent represents an agent that performs a binary operation on two input values.
    Config
    Config is an interface that defines the basic methods required for configuration objects.
    ConfLoader
    This class is responsible for handling the loading of configuration files, creating graphs, and generating corresponding HTML files.
    DivAgent
    The DivAgent class implements the Agent interface and performs division operations on messages received from two subscribed topics, then publishes the result to a third topic.
    GenericConfig
    GenericConfig is a class that implements the Config interface.
    Graph
    Represents a graph of nodes, where each node corresponds to a topic or an agent.
    HtmlGraphWriter
    A utility class for generating an HTML representation of a graph.
    HtmlLoader
    The HtmlLoader class handles HTTP requests and serves HTML content from the server.
    HTTPServer
    HTTPServer is an interface for handling HTTP requests and managing servlets.
    IncAgent
    Represents an Increment Agent that subscribes to a topic, increments the received value by 1, and publishes the result to one or more topics.
    Main
    The Main class is the entry point of the HTTP server application.
    MathExampleConfig
    The MathExampleConfig class implements the Config interface to create a mathematical example configuration.
    Message
    The Message class represents a message that can be passed between agents in a system.
    MulAgent
    The MulAgent class implements the Agent interface and performs multiplication operations on messages received from two subscribed topics, then publishes the result to a third topic.
    MyHTTPServer
    A simple HTTP server implementation that manages and dispatches HTTP requests to the appropriate servlets based on the request type and URI.
    Node
    Node class represents a node in the computational graph.
    ParallelAgent
    The ParallelAgent class wraps an Agent to enable asynchronous message processing.
    PlusAgent
    The PlusAgent class implements the Agent interface and performs addition operations on messages received from two subscribed topics, then publishes the result to a third topic.
    RequestParser
    The RequestParser class is responsible for parsing HTTP requests from a BufferedReader.
    RequestParser.RequestInfo
    A nested class representing the information parsed from an HTTP request.
    Servlet
    The Servlet interface defines the structure for handling HTTP requests and responses.
    SimpleServlet
    A simple implementation of the Servlet interface.
    SubAgent
    The SubAgent class implements the Agent interface and performs subtraction operations on messages received from two subscribed topics, then publishes the result to a third topic.
    SubServlet
    The SubServlet class implements the Servlet interface to handle HTTP requests for performing a subtraction operation.
    Topic
    The Topic class represents a communication topic in a publish-subscribe system.
    TopicDisplayer
    The TopicDisplayer class handles HTTP requests, displays topics and their messages, and provides responses with improved HTML styling.
    TopicManagerSingleton
    The TopicManagerSingleton class provides a thread-safe singleton for managing topics in a publish-subscribe system.
    TopicManagerSingleton.TopicManager
    Inner static class that holds the singleton instance of TopicManager.
